bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of distension and fullness brought forth by a qi movement upwards, contrary to its proper direction, and often accompanied by vomiting. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Fj: 腹中寒氣，雷鳴切痛，胸脅逆滿，嘔吐，附子粳米湯主 之 , “[If patients suffer from] cold qi in the abdomen with thunderous sounds and cutting pain, counterflow and fullness in the chest and flanks, as well as vomiting, the decoction with fu zi and jing mi controls this”.
